_comment: TEMPLATE FOR ADDING NEW EVENTS - Copy and paste the event object below

_instructions.title: Event title (required) - Will be auto-converted to ID
_instructions.dateDisplay: Display format (required): 'So, 29.03.26, 17:00' - Date will be auto-parsed from this
_instructions.image: Optional - If omitted, will auto-lookup by date pattern (YY-MM-DD.jpg). Just provide filename like '26-03-29.jpg'
_instructions.description: Event description (required) - Use \n\n for paragraph breaks
_instructions.footer: Footer info (required) - Usually pricing and registration info

upcoming.title: Event Title Here
upcoming.description:
Event description goes here.

Use double line breaks for new paragraphs.
upcoming.footer:
Eintritt frei – Kollekte.

Anmeldung empfohlen. Erstbesucher:innen für die Wegbeschreibung unbedingt anmelden!
